figmaInstructions.step2: Create a component for each SVG
figmaInstructions.step3: Group components by category (hair, hat, eyes, etc.)
figmaInstructions.step4: Create component variants for each style
figmaInstructions.step5: Set up color variables to match defaultColors
figmaInstructions.step6: Create main Avatar component combining all parts

colorMapping.#F9C9B6: Skin tone (replace with skin color variants)
colorMapping.#171921: Hair color (replace with hair color variants)
colorMapping.#9287FF: Shirt color (replace with shirt color variants)
colorMapping.#506AF4: Hat color (replace with hat color variants)
colorMapping.#FFD700: Earrings color (gold - replace with metal variants)
